name: LD47 - Walking on loop
description:
My submission for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam. Another solo project, art assets were all CC0 from opengameart (see below). It was a difficult theme this time ("Stuck in a loop"). I did the best I could do in the short space of time with my current skill set.

Art assets used (all CC-0):
496 pixel art icons for medieval/fantasy RPG by Henrique Lazarini (7Soul1)
(Submitted by gnola14)

Sci-fi platformer tileset by Buch

Sound generated with Bfxr
